attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Network Art has been running successfuly for the past 13 years for people with severe mental health issues, it works as a group setting allowing members to learn new skills such as mosaics and picture framing, it provids a crucial service for members, somewhere that your understood and valued,it keeps members well and lowers hospital admissions. Please sign our petition to save Network Art which will be closing 8th May 2009.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save Network Art."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19796


Prime Minister's Office
